title: How to Make a Halloween Sparkle Punch

steps.headline: Mix the Tang.
steps.description: Combine the cold water and Tang in a pitcher or jug. Stir until the powder dissolves in the water. Chill until it's cold, or until you're ready to serve the punch.

steps.headline: Add the goodies.
steps.description: When it's time to make the punch, take the Tang out of the fridge, and mix the ginger ale into the drink.

steps.headline: Serve it up cold.
steps.description: Pour the punch into individual cups, then place a scoop of ice cream into each cup.

text: Mix the Tang. Combine the cold water and Tang in a pitcher or jug. Stir until the powder dissolves in the water. Chill until it's cold, or until you're ready to serve the punch. Add the goodies. When it's time to make the punch, take the Tang out of the fridge, and mix the ginger ale into the drink. Serve it up cold. Pour the punch into individual cups, then place a scoop of ice cream into each cup. Serve and enjoy!
